mapper.insert:
insert into plan_board (user_id, article_title, article_content, plan_no, register_time) values (#{userId}, #{articleTitle}, #{articleContent}, #{planNo}, now())
select last_insert_id()

insert into review (article_no, content_id, content) values
(#{articleNo}, #{review.contentId}, #{review.content})
insert into file_info (article_no, save_folder, original_file, save_file) values (#{articleNo}, #{img.saveFolder}, #{img.originalFile}, #{img.saveFile})
mapper.select: select pb.article_no, pb.user_id, m.user_nickname, pb.article_title, pb.article_hit, pb.bookmark_cnt, pb.register_time, (select a.first_image from plan_seq s join attraction_info a on s.content_id = a.content_id where pb.plan_no = s.plan_no and a.first_image != "" order by s.plan_seq limit 1) as image from plan_board pb join trip_member m on pb.user_id = m.user_id order by pb.article_no desc

select pb.article_no, pb.user_id, m.user_nickname, pb.article_title, pb.article_hit, pb.bookmark_cnt, pb.register_time, (select a.first_image from plan_seq s join attraction_info a on s.content_id = a.content_id where pb.plan_no = s.plan_no and a.first_image != "" order by s.plan_seq limit 1) as image from plan_board pb join trip_member m on pb.user_id = m.user_id where pb.article_title like concat('%', #{word}, '%') order by pb.article_no desc

select pb.article_no, pb.user_id, m.user_nickname, pb.article_title, pb.article_content, pb.article_hit, pb.bookmark_cnt, pb.register_time, (select a.first_image from plan_seq s join attraction_info a on s.content_id = a.content_id where pb.plan_no = s.plan_no and a.first_image != "" order by s.plan_seq limit 1) as image from plan_board pb join trip_member m on pb.user_id = m.user_id where pb.article_no = #{articleNo}

select pb.article_no, s.plan_seq, s.content_id, a.title, a.first_image, r.content from plan_board pb join plan_seq s on pb.plan_no = s.plan_no join review r on pb.article_no = r.article_no and s.content_id = r.content_id join attraction_info a on r.content_id = a.content_id where pb.article_no = #{articleNo} order by s.plan_seq
